name: Imposter Solo Kill
description:
Imposter solo kill is a fun and engaging puzzle game. Your mission is simple: Execute all living crewmates in the spaceship. Let no one survive.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Tap to move around the ship, kill the crewmates, and sabotage the objects.
- When you kill everyone without getting noticed, the level is completed.

FEATURES:

- Incredibly simple to understand.
- One finger control
- Countless challenges from easy to expert.
- Absolute free to play.
